img_above_text:
The Dragonfly Guai fights in the air with his bow and poison arrows. The fact that he's flying most of the battle makes it tricky, but you can still reach him with many of your attacks when he's hovering. The Dragonfly Guai does soar higher at times, so be careful when casting Immobilize that you don't accidentally freeze him so high that your attacks can't reach.
## Dragonfly Guai Spirit
img_below_text:
* **Rain of Arrows**
* Equipped Effect: Slightly increases Qi gained from hits, but significantly reduces Maximum Health, Mana, and Stamina.

img_summary: The image showcases the "Dragonfly Guai Spirit" in the Equipment menu of a video game. This spirit allows the player to take the form of Dragonfly Guai, enabling the use of poison arrows via the "Rain of Arrows" ability. It has a moderate Qi cost and provides an equipped effect that slightly increases Qi gained from hits but significantly reduces Maximum Health, Mana, and Stamina. The menu also displays stats adjustments and a demo preview of the ability in action.
